response: *Edward Percy Smith (1891–1968), Conservative Member of Parliament for Ashford, 1943–1950
* The Shop at Sly Corner by Edward Percy Smith (1945)
She was married to the actor Reginald Denham, and later to MP and playwright Edward Percy Smith.
* The Shop at Sly Corner by Edward Percy Smith (1945)

The Ashford by-election of 1943 was held on 10 February 1943.  The by-election was held due to the appointment as Chief Justice of India of the incumbent Conservative MP, Patrick Spens.  It was won by the Conservative candidate Edward Percy Smith.
The Shop at Sly Corner is a 1945 thriller play by the British writer Edward Percy Smith.
